concepts.name: Intro
concepts.title: CSS Introduction
description: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets.
CSS describes how HTML elements are to be displayed on screen, paper, or in other media.

concepts.name: Selectors
concepts.title: CSS Selectors
description: CSS selectors are used to 'find' (or select) the HTML elements you want to style.
We can divide CSS selectors into five categories: Simple, Combinator, Pseudo-class, Pseudo-element, Attribute.
concepts.code:
<style>
div { background-color: lightgray; }
#myId { font-weight: bold; }
.className { padding: 10px; }
</style>
